scripts.build:win-x64: set CGO_ENABLED=1&& set GOFLAGS=-trimpath&& set GOMAXPROCS=8&& set ZIG_GLOBAL_CACHE_DIR=%CD%\.zig-cache&& set ZIG_LOCAL_CACHE_DIR=%CD%\.zig-cache&& set GOOS=windows&& set GOARCH=amd64&& set CC=zig cc -target x86_64-windows-gnu&& go build -buildmode=c-shared -ldflags="-s -w -buildid= -extldflags '-static-libgcc -static-libstdc++ -Wl,-Bstatic -lpthread -Wl,-Bdynamic'" -o ./binaries/core-win-x64.node .
scripts.build:linux-x64: set CGO_ENABLED=1&& set GOFLAGS=-trimpath&& set GOMAXPROCS=8&& set ZIG_GLOBAL_CACHE_DIR=%CD%\.zig-cache&& set ZIG_LOCAL_CACHE_DIR=%CD%\.zig-cache&& set GOOS=linux&& set GOARCH=amd64&& set CC=zig cc -target x86_64-linux-gnu&& go build -buildmode=c-shared -ldflags="-s -w -buildid=" -o ./binaries/core-linux-x64.node .
scripts.build:linux-arm64: set CGO_ENABLED=1&& set GOFLAGS=-trimpath&& set GOMAXPROCS=8&& set ZIG_GLOBAL_CACHE_DIR=%CD%\.zig-cache&& set ZIG_LOCAL_CACHE_DIR=%CD%\.zig-cache&& set GOOS=linux&& set GOARCH=arm64&& set CC=zig cc -target aarch64-linux-gnu&& go build -buildmode=c-shared -ldflags="-s -w -buildid=" -o ./binaries/core-linux-arm64.node .
scripts.build:macos-intel: set CGO_ENABLED=1&& set GOFLAGS=-trimpath&& set GOMAXPROCS=8&& set ZIG_GLOBAL_CACHE_DIR=%CD%\.zig-cache&& set ZIG_LOCAL_CACHE_DIR=%CD%\.zig-cache&& set GOOS=darwin&& set GOARCH=amd64&& set CC=zig cc -target x86_64-macos&& go build -buildmode=c-shared -ldflags="-s -w -buildid=" -o ./binaries/core-darwin-x64.node .
scripts.build:macos-arm: set CGO_ENABLED=1&& set GOFLAGS=-trimpath&& set GOMAXPROCS=8&& set ZIG_GLOBAL_CACHE_DIR=%CD%\.zig-cache&& set ZIG_LOCAL_CACHE_DIR=%CD%\.zig-cache&& set GOOS=darwin&& set GOARCH=arm64&& set CC=zig cc -target aarch64-macos&& go build -buildmode=c-shared -ldflags="-s -w -buildid=" -o ./binaries/core-darwin-arm64.node .
scripts.build:win-x64-linux: CGO_ENABLED=1 GOFLAGS=-trimpath GOMAXPROCS=8 GOOS=windows GOARCH=amd64 CC="zig cc -target x86_64-windows-gnu" go build -buildmode=c-shared -ldflags="-s -w -buildid= -extldflags '-static-libgcc -static-libstdc++ -Wl,-Bstatic -lpthread -Wl,-Bdynamic'" -o ./binaries/core-win-x64.node .
scripts.build:linux-x64-linux: CGO_ENABLED=1 GOFLAGS=-trimpath GOMAXPROCS=8 GOOS=linux GOARCH=amd64 CC="zig cc -target x86_64-linux-gnu" go build -buildmode=c-shared -ldflags="-s -w -buildid=" -o ./binaries/core-linux-x64.node .
scripts.build:linux-arm64-linux: CGO_ENABLED=1 GOFLAGS=-trimpath GOMAXPROCS=8 GOOS=linux GOARCH=arm64 CC="zig cc -target aarch64-linux-gnu" go build -buildmode=c-shared -ldflags="-s -w -buildid=" -o ./binaries/core-linux-arm64.node .
scripts.build: pnpm run build:win-x64 && pnpm run build:linux-x64 && pnpm run build:linux-arm64
scripts.build-on-linux: pnpm run build:win-x64-linux && pnpm run build:linux-x64-linux && pnpm run build:linux-arm64-linux
